import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import Footer from './Footer' import { useContext} from 'react' import {bookContext} from './context/bookContext/bookContext' const SellBook = () => { const {createBookAction} = useContext(bookContext) ; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title:"", author:"", price:Number, tags:"", condition:"", description:"", }); const { title , author, price , tags, condition, description } = formData; const onChangeInput = e => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); //dispatch action createBookAction(formData); }; return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} type="text" name="title" className="m-3 rounded-md border-2 bg-gray-50 py-2 pl-2 font-mono" placeholder="Title" /> setAuthor(e.target.value)} type="text" name="author" className="m-3 rounded-md border-2 bg-gray-50 py-2 pl-2 font-mono" placeholder="Author" /> setPrice(e.target.value)} type="number" name="price" className="m-3 rounded-md border-2 bg-gray-50 py-2 pl-2 font-mono" placeholder="Price in rupees" /> setTags(e.target.value)} type="text" name="tags" className="m-3 rounded-md border-2 bg-gray-50 py-2 pl-2 font-mono" placeholder="Tags" />
